Very nice rustic place.  Wood all around,  some big screens for thw sport.  Many burgers,  pastas and pizza.  Pasta was very basic and sauce a bit meager and the burger looked decent but not as juicy as wanted. However i am sure it is a great place to go with some friends,  watch some sports with a beer and some food. Prices very decent.  15 euro for 2 people lunch and drinks
